ygData.subject: Load Improvements
ygData.msgSnippet: In my prior crawlers I gained a significant improvement of my Downloaded KB/Sec when I used a proxy with the crawler. Is that the case with Heritrix 3 also?

In my prior crawlers I gained a significant improvement of my Downloaded KB=
/Sec when I used a proxy with the crawler. Is that the case with Heritrix 3=
 also?
Even with 1024 RAM, 60 Threads, 50 parallel queuing I can't reach mo=
re than an average of 300-400 KB/Sec. I tried all the improvements in the F=
AQ but it didn=E2=80=99t helped much, after a while not all the Threads are=
 active and I don't know why=E2=80=A6 I thought maybe a proxy would help. 
=
Thanks
